title: Sci Fi / Suspense - Room Tones, Ambiences
description: This sound pack is a composite collection of 100 room tones & ambience sounds recorded and designed to add depht and intensity to any audiovisual project that may have premises in Sci Fi- Suspense generes.
longDescription:
This sound pack is a composite collection of 100 room tones & ambience sounds recorded and designed to add depht and intensity to any audiovisual project that may have premises in Sci Fi- Suspense generes.


Preview; https://youtu.be/AAgACUTvyfQ

The sounds on this package are not aimed to be musical, rather atmospheric and constant. Some are source recordings in semi-abandoned sites and mostly designed from ambiences captured in these locations.

You'll find a wide range of sounds (spaceship interiors, wind/storm atmospheres, eerie dark corridors - basement room tones, industrial ambiences and Sci Fi textures).

All tracks loop seamlessly and do not exceed 30 seconds of duration.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  100 Loops (atmospheres, room tones and textures)
  •  All tracks loop seamlessly
  •  Spaceship interiors, wind/storm atmospheres, eerie basement & dark corridors room tones, industrial ambiences, Sci FI textures.


Number of Audio Waves: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit/44.1 khz (original recordings 24bit/96khz)

Do Sound FX loop: Yes, all sounds loop

Minutes of audio provided: 37:24

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
